question: Which of the following ministry formed Panel to protect homebuyers' interests?
option2: Union Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry
answer: Union Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry
explanation: Union Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry has formed a 30-member central advisory panel, which will advise government on implementation of the Real Estate Regulation Act (RERA) and will play an important role in protecting the interest of consumers. The panel is headed by Union Housing and Urban Affairs Minister and comprise Central and State government secretaries, real estate research organisations and representatives from home buyers associations.
